snippet.title: Boolean Java Tutorial
snippet.description:
New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast

- Boolean java data types are used for true and false. ✅I show you how to make a boolean variable and make your own working program!

👑Start practicing now with 10 free java programs - http://alexlorenlee.com/
🌅 Source Code - https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/Conditionals/BooleanInJava.java

boolean b = true;

This is how you create your boolean variable in java. Your java boolean can ONLY be true or false. 

This new variable called boolean in java can be trick at first... But SURELY you'll get it :) If you followed along, congrats! You learned-by-doing!

I hope you enjoyed this tutorial on how to use boolean java data types! I like to have a nice mix of tutorials and actual projects for you all :)

Do you want to learn how to code from scratch, in Java? Check out my Java Tutorial For Beginners: https://youtu.be/woJb2hAfkO0

What are you using boolean java variables for? -

Free tips and programs: http://alexlorenlee.com

TheNewBoston: https://youtube.com/user/thenewboston
